aiImageDetector.title: Check If AI Generated That Photo on Your iPhone
aiImageDetector.description: Romance scams stole $1.14 billion from consumers in 2023, the highest losses of any impostor fraud, <ftcLink>says the FTC</ftcLink>. Swindlers now spin up <fakeDatingLink>fake dating profiles</fakeDatingLink> with AI-generated faces and chatbots. Our AI image detector lives on your iPhone, so you can check if AI generated that selfie, receipt, or product shot before you swipe or buy. It flags watermarks plus subtle face artefacts the human eye misses.

aiFingerprints.title: Remove AI Fingerprints and Humanise AI on iPhone
aiFingerprints.description: Cloud "AI humaniser" sites often pipe your words into remote LLMs that leave new fingerprints behind. Slop Or Not scrubs zero-width spaces, homoglyphs and spacing tricks - like the binary pattern <elonLink>Elon Musk used in 2008 to catch a Tesla leaker</elonLink> - without rewriting your style.
